projects.title: Booki
projects.description: I created the homepage of a travel agency using HTML and CSS, integrating responsive design based on Figma mockups for various devices. This project honed my skills in responsive design and HTML/CSS integration, laying the groundwork for proficient front-end development.

projects.title: Ohmyfood
projects.description: I improved a website interface by integrating a mobile-first design, implementing CSS animations using Sass, and versioning the project with Git and GitHub. Our goal was to enhance user experience by making the site responsive and interactive.

projects.title: Sophie Bluel
projects.alt: representation of the Sophie Bluel project
projects.description: I developed the architect's work presentation page from provided HTML, along with an admin login page and a modal for media uploads, honing my JavaScript skills extensively.

projects.title: Kasa
projects.description: I created a web application for real estate rental using React and React Router, focusing on data presentation logic and React components and managed state with React Hooks.

projects.title: Nina Carducci
projects.alt: visualization of the Nina Carducci project
projects.description: I optimized a photographer's website by identifying and resolving loading and SEO issues, improving code structure, speed, and accessibility. Utilizing tools like Lighthouse and Wave, I implemented changes, documented through before-and-after reports with audit screenshots and detailed explanations.

projects.title: 724 Events
projects.description: I debugged and finalized the development of a one-page website, utilizing Chrome DevTools to identify and resolve existing issues. Additionally, I managed the project using Yarn, Node.js, GitHub for version control, and Visual Studio Code for coding and debugging tasks.

projects.title: Argent Bank
projects.alt: visualization of the Argent Bank project
projects.description: I developed the front-end of a banking application using React and Redux to create a dynamic user experience. I integrated it with the back-end through API calls. I utilized Swagger to define API endpoints and modeled interactions with transaction data.

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.description: I successfully created and published my developer portfolio, utilizing Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It showcased my skills, projects, and professional journey in a visually appealing and responsive manner, demonstrating proficiency in web development and SEO optimization.
